scripts.bundle:dev: npm run tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/bundle.js
scripts.bundle:prod: npm run tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/bundle.js
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run bundle:prod && npm run vue-tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && electron-builder
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run bundle:dev && node scripts/dev.js
